long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download twitch stream you are currently watching !

This app will allow you to download any stream on Twitch. Simply by pressing the Start button, and then Download button when you want.

You also can download stream from multiple tabs at same time.

If you don't see the Replay extension controls, please do CTRL+F5 page.

Please be aware that your browser will store the video until you download it.
Don't store too many hours of stream on your browser, download it and then press Clean button to empty the browser, or refresh page. You also can lower the resolution to make the file lighter.
